text: (napiyē!) Nīr pārkkavillaiyā? Niccayamāka allāh pūmiyiluḷḷa aṉaittaiyum uṅkaḷukku vacappaṭuttik koṭukkiṟāṉ. Kappal avaṉuṭaiya kaṭṭaḷaippaṭi kaṭalil celkiṟatu. Taṉ aṉumatiyiṉṟi pūmiyiṉ mītu vāṉam viḻātu avaṉ taṭuttuk koṇṭirukkiṟāṉ. Niccayamāka allāh maṉitarkaḷ mītu mikka irakkamuṭaiyavaṉ, karuṇaiyuṭaiyavaṉ āvāṉ
